title: The Soft Bulletin - The Flaming Lips (Complete/FLAC)
description:
The Soft Bulletin
The Flaming Lips (1999)

16 bit / 44.1 khz FLAC

Complete Edition

--------------------------------------------

After scouring the internet for every version of every track on the Soft Bulletin, here it is in lossless glory. The first disc contains the mixes the Flaming Lips themselves created in the order that they originally intended. This combines tracks from the US and UK CD releases, and is identical to the tracks and order found on the vinyl release. Disc 2 contains the remixes that Warner Bros. commissioned for the potential singles, mixed by Peter Mokran. 

--------------------------------------------


Disc 1

1. Race for the Prize
2. A Spoonful Weighs a Ton
3. The Spark that Bled
4. The Spiderbite Song
5. Buggin'
6. What is the Light??
7. The Observer
8. Waitin' for a Superman
9. Suddenly Everything Has Changed
10. The Gash
11. Slow Motion
12. Feeling Yourself Disintegrate
13. Sleeping on the Roof

Disc 2 (Peter Mokran Remixes)

1. Race for the Prize (Remix)
2. Waitin' for a Superman (Remix)
3. Buggin' (Remix)
